summary: Thousands of service members transition to civilian life each year. We testified about our prior work on efforts to support their mental health during this transition. While DOD and the Department of Veterans Affairs have programs to provide support, we found that improvements are needed to increase access to them. For example, one DOD program relied on cold-calling to reach transitioning service members, but often...
title: DOD and VA Transition Programs: Recommendations for Improving Mental Health Support
